strings.author: Author
strings.config_missing_author_email: Author and email must be set in Settings.
strings.gui_export_profile_miro_help: Max. 30 MB per page, capped at 8192x4096 (32 MP), sharp at 400% zoom with SVG when possible.
strings.pptx.http.bad_status: HTTP PPTX renderer responded with an unexpected status.
strings.pptx.http.connection_failed: Failed to connect to the HTTP PPTX renderer.
strings.pptx.http.endpoint_missing: HTTP PPTX renderer endpoint is not configured.
strings.pptx.http.invalid_endpoint: HTTP PPTX renderer endpoint must be an HTTP(S) URL.
strings.pptx.http.invalid_response: HTTP PPTX renderer returned an invalid PDF.
strings.pptx.http.missing_dependency: Install the 'pptx_http' extra to enable the HTTP renderer.
strings.pptx_backend_crashed: The PPTX provider crashed while rendering.
strings.pptx_banner_message: PPTX rendering is unavailable without an external provider. Configure one in Settings â†’ PPTX Renderer.
strings.pptx_conflicting_options: The selected options cannot be combined.
strings.pptx_corrupt: The PPTX file appears to be corrupt.
strings.pptx_empty_selection: The selected slide range is empty.
strings.pptx_permission_denied: The PPTX provider was denied access to a required resource.
strings.pptx_resource_limits: The PPTX provider exceeded an allowed resource limit.
strings.pptx_timeout: The PPTX provider timed out while rendering.
strings.pptx_unavailable: The PPTX provider is unavailable on this system.
strings.pptx_unsupported_option: The selected option is not supported by the PPTX provider.
strings.strings.miro_custom_dpi_unresolved: DPI could not be resolved for the custom profile.
